name: Bakemonogatari Game
description:
This is a fan game of the anime series Bakemonogatari. It consists of 6 minigames to play. The games are short and simple. If you are a fan of the show you might enjoy it more.

If you want to play the game without downloading you can play it Here. 

This is a page if you want to download the game files and play it offline/wanna view the sprites. You can download it for free but if you would like to support you can pay!
